newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Somague at year high, upside seen.
newsitem.headline: Somague at year high, upside seen.

text.p: Portuguese construction company Somague hit a high for the year on Monday of 1,500 escudos before easing slightly to 1,490 but it was still up 4.2 percent on the previous close.
Traders said the stock could gain further given the outlook for the construction sector. "The price is likely to break above 1,500 escudos, even if in thin liquidity," said one trader.
The approach of the start up of building on the Alqueva dam project, of which Somague is a member of the main consortium, was also kindling interest, traders said.
